snippet: In a sign that the two sides were heading toward a diplomatic thaw, the countries agreed to revive the last remaining symbol of their economic cooperation.
abstract: North and South Korea agree to reopen joint industrial complex in a sign that the two sides are inching toward a thaw after months of high tension earlier in 2013.
lead_paragraph: In a sign that the two sides were heading toward a diplomatic thaw, the countries agreed to revive the last remaining symbol of their economic cooperation.

headline.main: Koreas Agree to Reopen Factory Park in North
headline.print_headline: Koreas Agree To Reopen Factory Park In North
